attributes.action: Over 65 Bond for all women state pensioners
attributes.additional_details:
Women who reach their official State Pension Age before 65 are not eligible for the new Bonds.

I propose the NS&I offer the new 65+ Guaranteed Growth Bond to all State Pensioners including those women born between 1950 and 1955 who are now eligible for State Pensions.

Would all women caught up in this State Pension Age trap please sign this e-petition.

We owe it to ourselves to be recognised and counted as official State Pensioners by the NS&I.

rejection.details: It appears you have sent this twice. I have closed this as a duplicate. The other one you submitted is visible on the e-Petition website.
